summary: Simply changes the Daedric armor to a light variant for those who want it.
descriptionHtml: This mods converts the Daedric armour to a light variant compatible with all associated perks and any mod that changes light armour based perks. The weight has been cut in half to reflect the lighter armour but the damage resistance has been kept the same for consistency, and the smithing requirements have been reduced as well. Please report any compatibility issues from in game assets, thank you. To install just extract to the Skyrim data folder and check the box in NMM or in the launcher.
author: basscross64
